game.name: Super Buddy Kick
game.description:
Super Buddy Kick is one of the best adventure games for boys with excellent graphics and simple controls. Many experts call it as the ultimate stress reliever due to the seamless gameplay it offers to the gamers. In this brand new free online game, you have to hit the Buddy with blades and hammers. Make sure to drop flames over him, explore grenades and shoot him with rifles and pistols, if needed. Don’t forget to let off some steam to cool down his anger in this cool adventure game. 

He has shown his trust on you to help him to be the greatest hero of all the time. Give him the tough training by placing the hero between the anvil and hammer! Once it’s done, deliver the final hard kick in this brutal game. Your primary objective is to mutilate the ragdoll in different ways. Feel free to drag him to throw it out, while hold and touch to utilize other weapons in this one of the top boys games! 

After completing each adventure game, your score will be displayed in front of the screen. Also get ready to obtain the rewards if you have performed outstanding in the game. Use the earned coins and points to upgrade your weapons. He will surely be happy if you succeed in cooling him down. Do your best and assist the Buddy to wear the crown of being the best hero you have even seen in your life!!

game.mobileControlKeys: KEEP TAP ON BUBBY AND THROW HIM TOWARDS WALLS TO KILL HIM
game.webControlKeys: LEFT CLICK MOUSE ,HOLD THE BUDDY AND HIT HIM ON THE WALL
